name: NightMode For Zhihu.com 夜间知乎
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.zhihu.com/"), url-prefix("http://www.zhihu.com/"), url-prefix("https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/") {
/*=== 
 *【自用，上传只为保存】
 * 作者：QIUZAIYOU 
 * 最后更新：20200716
===*/
/* 垃圾元素屏蔽 */
.AdblockBanner,
div[data-za-detail-view-path-module_name="相关推荐"],
.HoverCard--isLoading,
.SignFlowHomepage-downloadBtn,
.Pc-card,
.PlaceHolder,
.Pc-feedAd-container {
	display: none!important;
}
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.zhihu.com/"), url-prefix("https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com") {
/* Chrome - 修改滚动条 */
::-webkit-scrollbar {
	width: 6px!important;
	height: 6px!important;
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-track-piece {
	background-color: #141414!important;
	-webkit-border-radius: 0!important;
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:vertical {
	height: 5px!important;
	background-color: #2b94ff!important;
	-webkit-border-radius: 6px!important;
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:horizontal {
	width: 5px!important;
	background-color: #2b94ff!important;
	-webkit-border-radius: 6px!important;
}
/* 样式修改 */
/* -- 背景色 -- */
body,
.explore-tab .tab-navs .tab-nav.active > a,
.modal-dialog-title,
.zm-meta-panel,
.SignContainer-switch,
.VagueImage,
.VagueImage-mask::before,
.FeedbackForm-canvasContainer-mrde,
a.toggle-expand,
.QuestionWaiting-typesTopper,
.Post-content,
.VoteButton,
div[class*="Header-module-body-"],
div[class*="ContentItem-module-typeTag-"],
.QuestionRelatedCard,
.Tag,
.PostItem,
.PagingButton,
.AnswerItem-statusContent,
.QuestionType--active {
	background: #212121!important;
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0);
}
div[class*="SectionBar-module-root-"]:before,
div[class*="SectionBar-module-root-"]:after {
	background: transparent!important;
}
.ContentItem-actions,
.zu-top,
html.no-touchevents .tab-navs .tab-nav.active > a:hover,
.AppHeader,
.Card,
.ProfileHeader-wrapper,
.UserAvatar,
.QuestionHeader,
.QuestionHeader-footer,
.Popover-content,
.Popover-arrow::after,
.Topbar,
.Modal-inner,
.CommentsV2-footer,
.CornerButton,
.zh-backtotop .btn-action,
html.no-touchevents .tab-navs .tab-nav > a:hover,
.zm-item-vote-count,
.topics-plaza,
div[class*='_CommentForm_bordered_'],
.modal-dialog,
.SettingsMain-mainColumn,
.SettingsFAQ,
.ExpandableField-titleView,
.ExpandableField,
.Switch::after,
.NestComment,
.CommentsV2,
.Menu-item,
.PushNotifications-item,
.UserCover,
.UserCoverEditor-action,
.SignContainer-content input,
.SignFlowInput-errorMask,
.Login-options,
.UploadPicture-wrapper,
.UserCoverEditor,
.ProfileHeader-userCover,
.HoverCard-loading,
.SearchTabs,
div[class*='Modal-modal-'],
.zm-votebar .up,
.zm-votebar .down,
.ac-renderer,
.zu-autocomplete-row-label,
.ac-row.zu-autocomplete-row-search-link,
.ExploreSpecialCard,
.ExploreHomePage-ContentSection-moreButton a,
.ExploreRoundtableCard,
.ExploreCollectionCard,
.ExploreColumnCard,
.SignFlowHomepage-downloadBtn,
.QuestionWaiting-types,
.TooltipContent,
.TooltipContent-arrow::after,
.InputLike,
.RichContent-actions.is-fixed,
.ColumnPageHeader,
div[class*="-module-root-"],

.zg-form-text-input,
.zg-form-select,
textarea,

.Messages-newItem,

}

/* -- 阴影 -- */
.zu-top,
.AppHeader {
	box-shadow: 0 0 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .7)!important;
}
.zu-top-search-input,
.topic-recommend.modal-dialog,
*[class*='_CommentBox_root_'],
*[class*='_CommentBox_bordered_'],
.SettingsMain-mainColumn,
.SettingsFAQ,
.Switch::after,
.CommentsV2-withPagination,
.Card,
.QuestionHeader-footer.is-fixed {
	box-shadow: none!important;
}
/* -- 属性修改 -- */
.zu-top {
	border: none!important;
}

.tab-navs {
	margin-bottom: 0!important;
}
.MoreAnswers .List-headerText {
	padding: 3px 20px!important;
	border-radius: 989px!important;
}

.MoreAnswers .List-header::after {
	top: 28px!important;
}
span[class*='_CommentBox_dividerText_'] {
	border-radius: 99px!important;
}
.Input {
	box-sizing: border-box!important;
	padding: 0 5px!important;
}
.VerificationDialogModal-smsInputButton,
.SignFlow-smsInputButton {
	right: 5px!important;
}
.noti-spinner {
	filter: invert(50%) sepia(66%) saturate(14%) hue-rotate(337deg) brightness(92%) contrast(94%);
}
.Register-content .SignFlow-smsInputErrorMessage,
.SignFlowInput-errorMask {
	padding-left: 5px!important;
}
.Register-smsBackUp {
	border-top: 1px solid #424242!important;
}
.Qrcode-img {
	padding: 5px!important;
	background: #fff!important;
}
.AppBanner-qrcode {
	padding: 2px!important;
	background: #fff!important;
}
.zu-top-search-input {
	font-weight: bold!important;
}
.RecognizerListModal-header {
	padding-bottom: 5px!important;
}
code {
	font-family: consolas, Menlo, "PingFang SC", "Microsoft YaHei", monospace;
	color: #afafaf;
	font-size: .875rem;
	padding: .1875rem .625rem;
	background: #2c2c2c;
	margin: 0 .3125rem;
	border-radius: .25rem;
	border-bottom: .0625rem solid #3072f6;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}
.highlight pre {
	width: 100%;
	padding-left: 10px;
	padding-right: 10px;
	background-color: #2c2c2c;
}
.highlight pre code,
.css-1hmxk26 {
	border: none;
}
.SignContainer-content .Input-wrapper {
	height: 49px!important;
}
/* 首页 */
.RichContent-cover-inner {
	z-index: 915049;
}
}
